title: Technical Info - Orbital Temple ah hian a awm a
heading: Technical chungchang hriat tur

satellite.heading: Satellite hmanga siam a ni
satellite.specs:
A zau zawng: 50x58x64 mm
1P PocketQube ah a awm
A rih zawng: 245 gr
Thil hman tur: aluminium, rangkachak, fiberglass, leh electronic components te.
Orbit: A san zawng 525 ± 25 km; inclination: SSO 97.6 ± 0.1° a ni
Launcher: PSLV (Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle) chu ISRO-in a enkawl a ni

antenna.heading: Antenna/Sculpture hmanga siam a ni
antenna.specs:
A len zawng: 6 m (diameter) e 1.2m (a san zawng)
A rih zawng: 46 kg
Thil hman tur: aluminium, epoxy mirrored board, rangkachak aluminium dome, scaffolding structure hmanga innghat.

radio.heading: Radio Specs a ni
radio.specs:
Downlink: 468.5 MHz a ni
Modulation: CSS hmanga siam a ni
Bandwidth: TBD a ni

imageAlt: Orbital Temple Satellite hmanga siam a ni
